title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, July 19, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss describes a Sunday in camp. He comments on the New York draft riots and Northern morale, and says that the Gettysburg casualties were much fewer than reported.
